name: Etraclor
description:
Discover a fun and simple card game that you can play home with your own 54 card game. 

Play characters, give them weapons to attack, shields to protect, potions to heal and magic to throw spells !

Join the discord to find an opponent : https://discord.gg/HnrZQPST6A
even if most of the players are french for now, feel free to ask in english most of us speak english enough to play with you !


Get all informations at https://etraclor.com
sorry this isn't translated yet, it's a french game but translation coming soon.
